Patient Details

Weight (KG)

Dehydration (%)

Cont. losses (ml/h)

Hypovolemic shock

Bolus for a dog

0 - 0 ml in 15 mins

15-20 ml/kg

Check perfusion after each bolus

Fluid therapy

Maintenance fluid

0 ml/h

(30 x kg +70) / 24 h

Correct dehydration in 6 hours

0 ml/h

maintenance (ml/h) + (kg x dehydration % x 10)/6h + continued losses

Correct dehydration in 12 hours

0 ml/h

maintenance (ml/h) + (kg x dehydration % x 10)/12h + continued losses

Correct dehydration in 24 hours

0 ml/h
